attributes.action: 2Million Iraqi Refugees and & 1.3 Million Displaced Iraqi People in Iraq are in desperate need of Help
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Dear Mr Tony Blair
The UNHCR chief António Guterres estimated there are about 2 Million Iraqi Citizens who took refuge in neighbouring countries to Iraq .The USA is taking about 7000 as refugeees . The United Kingdom should  take a share to relief the Burden on Iraqi people by donation and accepting some of Iraqis as refugees

reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
